thread.title: Sarah Parchert

author: Sarah Parchert
title: Sarah Parchert
text:
I started ordering from Chewy.com when we got two dogs shortly after I had surgery and I couldn't carry the bags to my car from a traditional store. I am so glad I became a customer! They have great prices for the dog food and amazing customer care. When I underestimated how much food the puppy would eat, all I had to do was click "ship now" and the next day there was food for Jet. Furthermore, when a collar didn't fit, they refunded me the money and asked me to donate the collar to an animal shelter.
Excellent company, we plan to be lifetime customers!
